entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add IsEnumerated property to IEnumerable<T> interface #80144
  • ConfigurationBinderBenchmarks.Get benchmark failing in "Performance Linux x64 release mono Interpreter micro_mono perftiger NoJS False net8.0" #80141
  • CoreCLR JIT-generated code does not respect the Win x64 calling convention for the Memcpy/Memset helper calls #80140
  • Concurrent struct marshaling can lead to use-after-free crashes due to pGeneratedNewStub determination in CreateInteropILStub #80127
    8.0.0
  • [TestFailure] HttpClientHandlerTest.Http3 - quic.aiortc.org unreachable #80125
    8.0.0
  • Consider mapping more regex sets to AnyClass #80123
    Future
  • "Cross Platform Cryptography" article is out of date #80122
  • Unobserved Task Exception after closing ClientWebSocket #80116
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 50 Regressions on 12/28/2022 6:20:56 PM #80129
  • Getting Java.IO.FileNotFoundException on calling httpClient.PostAsync in MAUI app - Android #80139
  • System.Text.Json IgnoreReadOnlyProperties not working for enumerables #80113
  • System.Net.Quic is leaking UnobservedTaskExceptions #80111
    8.0.0
  • Wrong crossgen2 binary in artifacts/tests #80110
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetGeneration_fail/GetGeneration_fail.sh #80109

Closed

  • Test failure: Interop/ObjectiveC/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI.sh #79664
    8.0.0
  • Invoking GetSemanticModel causes a signal 11 code 1 crash on Android .NET 7.0.1 #80146
  • LibraryImport with custom StringMarshalling type causes the source generator to keep the Compilation object alive #78242
    8.0.0
  • Causing diffrent memory layout in .NET 6 and .NET 7 when field member has LayoutKind.Auto #80077
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79453
    8.0.0
  • Consider updating 'BenchmarksGame' benchmarks to use HWIntrinsics #31292
    Future
  • Add ref T overloads for hardware intrinsic functions which takes T* #36182
    Future
  • AVX-512 support in System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 #35773
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Adding and subtracting floats with vectors #79960
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Decimal` constants #80042
  • Regressions in System.Memory.ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfString #80131
  • Two dimensional array with function pointers in .NET Framework (debug) #80112
  • Deadlock when enumerating resources with ResourceManager #74868
    8.0.0
  • System.Resources.ResourceManager is not thread safe when ignore case is enabled #74052
    Future
  • EnvironmentVariable operations with EnvironmentVariableTarget.User fails on Windows Nano Server #30566
    Future
  • HttpClient The response ended prematurely #72177
    8.0.0
  • Replace `Unsafe.NullRef<T>()` usage #80107
  • Inconsistent Uri c'tor implementation for Windows and Linux #80118
    8.0.0
  • InternalException at SslStream at DuplexPipeStreamAdapter DisposeAsync #66188
    8.0.0
  • Disabling test on Linux Bionic is not effective with `PlatformSpecific` #72369
    8.0.0
  • Docker .NET7.0 publish PublishAot fail with no gcc #80108
  • IL instruction: ldtoken(method) compiles incorrectly at PublishAOT. #78955
  • Exception in Socket.~Socket #1218
    Future
  • ILGenerator.Emit produces Method not found #76082
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #80153
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #80152
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve emitter output for IG creation/saving and other improvements #80151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #80150
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, 7.0.x
  • Enable new analyzers CA1510/11/12/13 and CA1856/57/58 #80149
    area-Meta
  • Ensure that we don't root the compilation when using a custom exception marshalling type. #80147
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add ConditionalSelect SIMD intrinsics #80145
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid generating unnecessary debug info #80143
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable regex generator nullable reference types validation #80142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use lower size optimization for tests #80137
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP][mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • SimdAsHWIntrinsic improvements and cleanup #80134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80128
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete erroneous simplifer annotation for regex fixer #80126
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80121
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80120
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Fix bunch of incompatibilies of ComWrappers #80119
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove page map from PAL virtual memory allocator #80105
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Revert back to using latest stable versions of chrome for testing #80135
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable inlining for helper method #80124
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.0
  • Generate CodeView debug information for .asm files #77084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add WidenUpper and WidenLower SIMD intrins #80117
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Hosting DirectSettingsOverrideConfigurationSetting and ConfigurationSettingCanInfluenceEnvironment test failures in CI #79455
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • SuperPMI: Be more flexible in finding coredistools #80054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include zero-sized diffs in the set of textual diffs generated #79917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore SendMessageTimeout failures on Windows Nano Server #80099
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • fix (doc) : Specify where `*.dgml` files are generated #80115
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Expand compare + brfalse/brtrue with single conditional branch opcode #80046
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Generate fewer `ExactMethodInstantiationsHashtable` entries #80090
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ignore uninstantiated generic method #80096
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] AOT BCL tests using -O1 to avoid OOM errors on CI. #80103
  • Fix HTTP/2 extended connect hang #80066
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/7.0] Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79866
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] enable JITs for interp->aot and aot->interp transitions #78493
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Enable CoreCLR init failure logging in single exe host #80104
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Rewrite how Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 are implemented #80091
    area-System.Numerics
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79870
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove the TypeKey concept as the primary user for the concept is unable to use it effectively. #79418
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Fix crash in fixer on certain invalid patterns #80007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79994
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 7.0.x
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Avoid emitting gshared methods multiple times when prefer… #80100
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79862
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 6.0.x
  • Add more precise tracking of static bases #80093
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
